about_the_game:
"Echoes of Despair" invites you on a chilling journey into the heart of an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Take on the role of Sarah, an investigative journalist, and explore the mysteries surrounding the troubled past of the hospital. Uncover the truth behind inhumane experiments and long-buried secrets as you navigate through haunted corridors inhabited by supernatural entities and tormented spirits.

Key Features


  • Immersive Horror Experience: Immerse yourself in a captivating horror narrative set in the heart of an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Confront your deepest fears as you traverse dimly lit corridors and discover the terrors lurking in the shadows.

  • Compelling Plot: Unravel a dark and twisted plot by investigating the disturbing history of the hospital. Discover hidden documents, solve puzzles, and confront supernatural entities standing in the way of the truth.

  • Survival Gameplay: Navigate through a series of thrilling experiences, using your wit to outsmart and escape supernatural threats. Limited resources and a menacing atmosphere add extra tension to your struggle for survival.

  • Detailed Environments: Explore environments that bring the abandoned psychiatric hospital to life. Lighting, sound design, and realistic graphics contribute to an immersive horror experience.



    Are you brave enough to face the "Echoes Of Despair"? Live a truly terrifying adventure that will leave you questioning what is real and what is the product of the haunted history within these walls. Enter the hospital now and unveil the darkness resonating through the corridors of despair.
